entry.title: takuji31/p5-qpsmtpd-plugin-jobqueue
entry.summary:
Qpsmtpd JobQueue plugin

This is Perl module Qpsmtpd::Plugin::JobQueue.

INSTALLATION

Qpsmtpd::Plugin::JobQueue installation is straightforward. If your CPAN shell is set up, you should just be able to do

% cpan Qpsmtpd::Plugin::JobQueue

Download it, unpack it, then build it as per the usual:

% perl Makefile.PL
% make && make test

Then install it:

% make install

DOCUMENTATION

Qpsmtpd::Plugin::JobQueue documentation is available as in POD. So you can do:

% perldoc Qpsmtpd::Plugin::JobQueue

to read the documentation online with your favorite pager.

Nishibayashi Takuji
